title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the meaning with units

Midpoint Riemann sum is 10*[v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)] =10*[9.2+7.0+2.4+4.3]=229 The integral gives the total distance in miles that the plane flies during the 40 minutes.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the meaning with units

Midpoint Riemann sum is 10*[v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)] =10*[9.2+7.0+2.4+4.3]=229

The integral gives the total distance in miles that the plane flies during the 40 minutes.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the meaning with units

Midpoint Riemann sum is 10*[v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)] =10*[9.2+7.0+2.4+4.3]=229

The integral gives the total distance in miles that the plane flies during the 40 minutes.

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the meaning with units

Midpoint Riemann sum is 10*[v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)] =10*[9.2+7.0+2.4+4.3]=229

The integral gives the total distance in miles that the plane flies during the 40 minutes.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the meaning with units

Midpoint Riemann sum is 10*[v(5)+v(15)+v(25)+v(35)] =10*[9.2+7.0+2.4+4.3]=229

The integral gives the total distance in miles that the plane flies during the 40 minutes.
